nodes.long_description:
**Become part of an elite special forces unit in Tactical Assault VR!**

• Habie147 - ‘Tactical Assault Is One Of The Best Hardcore Shooters I’ve Played’

• Gamertag VR - ‘The Best Tactical VR FPS On Quest’

• Controlled Pairs - ‘The Best CQB Game I've Ever Played’

Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

# Features
**PvE Missions: Solo or Online Multiplayer Co-Op with Up to 6 Players**
{1487526115258066}

**PvP: Competitive Online Multiplayer**
{1082589306850803}

**7 Non-Linear, Asymmetrical Maps**

Plan your assault. The choice is yours.
{448475627682065}

**Game Mode Variety**

Bomb Defusal, Hostage Rescue, High-Value Target (HVT) Eliminations, Mini Games, Room Randomizer Killhouse
{1946208202559962}

**30+ Detailed Weapons and Counting**

Customize your loadout with tactical gear including vests, helmets, weapons, scopes, sights, grips and breaching equipment.
{1007758587705278}
nodes.short_description: Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

nodes.long_description:
Become part of an elite special forces unit and use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to clear rooms, breach doors, and defeat the enemy threat.

FEATURES:

• Utilize an arsenal of weapons, scopes, sight attachments, explosives and equipment.

• Take note of simulated wind and target distance with the wind meter and spotter scope. Calculate physics-based bullet drop and time-to-hit to improve your accuracy.

• Use stealth to sneak up behind enemies with a silent knife kill. Or go head-to-head against enemies that will take cover and attempt to flank your position.

• Randomized Enemy positions and doors, making each play-through an unknown challenge.

• Non-linear maps give players an endless variety in how they choose to infiltrate and complete missions. Enter buildings through doors, climb ladders to reach rooftops, or climb through windows. The choice is yours.

Tactical Assault VR is currently an Early Access release and is updated regularly.
nodes.short_description: Tactical MilSim CQB (Close Quarters Battles) in Virtual Reality

nodes.change_log:
Tactical Assault VR v0.8.54 Bug Fixes/Refinements
• Fixed Virtus and Rattler first mag not being able to be inserted after removing
• "Change Loadout" button is now available when you first enter a Coop Training room
• Updated Enemy models with added variety

Tactical Assault VR v0.8.53 Bug Fixes/Refinements
• Fixed PvP not loading Urban Training Night map when joining room
• Fixed Grenade kills being counted for other players. Kills are only counted for the person who threw the grenade
• Fixed: Re-patched spotter scope rendering other players spotter scope. For real this time....
• Fixed: PvP Urban Training: Closed off bottom of electrical box to prevent players from teleporting inside the walls 
• Additional Logic added to prevent loadout spamming/duplication
• Reduced SVD Damage
• Expanded "Room Info" information in multiplayer lobbies
• Reduced Lock-picking sensitivity
• Changed: Equipping Primary and Secondary automatically spawns onto your vest. Does not spawn in the air unless AutoSling option is turned off. Don't forget to rack your weapons.

Tactical Assault VR v0.8.52 PvP Bug Fixes
• Fixed (again) PvP matches not being join-able by code...for real this time....
• Reverted PvP Team selection buttons on Equip weapon menu. Still on a 3-minute timer after each team change
• Various PvP scene loading refinements
• Added hit reactions to player avatars
• Refinements to avatar walking animation
• Fixed Urban Training Night lighting
• Fixed grab indicator getting locked in place after death
• Fixed geometry collision hole in Trident Lightning

Tactical Assault VR  v0.8.51
• Fixed VOID sewer wall not being breach-able
• Fixed Downed Avatar dragging
• Fixed Private PvP matches not being join-able by code
• Fixed being flashed and blinded by that extremely bright white box when loading PvP. My EYES!!! Sorry, I didn't mean to burn your retinas.
• Fixed spotter scope rendering other spotter scope cameras
• Fixed network memory leak linked to multiplayer kills/deaths
• Fixed kill score subtracting when killed by other players
• Fixed player avatars going into ragdoll, but player is still alive as a ghost. Whooooooo spooky!
• Fixed PvP death score going into negative when selecting a team
• Changed PvP: downed players can no longer kill themselves through the change loadout button
• Changed PvP: Team Selection is timed out for 3 minutes after every team change
• Improvements to PvP scene loading
• Various improvements to PvP logic
• Added Urban Training Day to PvP
• Added Urban Shootout Night to Shootout Mode
• Added Multiplayer Region select to multiplayer menu (note that "Current Players" count only accounts for the amount of players currently connected to your region. By default, all players are connected to USA_Central unless the player manually changes their region. Regions available: North America, Europe, Asia, Australia


Tactical Assault VR v0.8.5 Breaking Whisper
• Added Breaking Whisper Mission
• Added Shootout mode to multiplayer coop map selection
• Added Map Drawing/Planning to Training Lobbies and Main Menu (Engineered by Justin P. Barnett)
• Added AK105 Rifle (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added M16 Classic Rifle w/ burst fire (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added VEPR12 Primary Shotgun (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added M4 Entry Primary Shotgun (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added 590 Mariner Primary Shotgun (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added 590A1 Primary Shotgun (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added MICH Low helmets to Avatar Customization (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added FM12 gas mask to avatar customization (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Added Boonie Camo to Avatar Customization
• Added Press (War Correspondent) Avatar in Gender Selection. You can now identify as PRESS
• Added "Antonio Smith" to head selection (Eduardo's brother)
• Added Grenade Kill scoring
• Added Friendly Fire toggle in multiplayer coop lobbies
• Added additional Vest speed options to Avatar Customization
• Updated Spotter Scope to Moskito style scope (Modeled by Puddle_NL)
• Updated Mission Selection UI
• Normal difficulty enemies now carry random weapons between M4A1 and AKM
• Added Enemy Strafing when firing
• Enemies will be alerted if they pass by a dead enemy body
• Increased enemy alertness for passing bullets and bullet impacts
• Removed enemy weapon hitboxes. Increased enemy reaction time for difficulty balance
• Updated Enemy Ai logic and animation transitions
• Updated: Hostages are now enemy targets after triggering them to follow
• Significantly lowered hostage health. Dead hostage = mission failure
• Hostages no longer take commands from downed/dead players
• Updated singleplayer sandbox to use multiplayer sandbox with room randomizer
• Added night-time sandbox and room randomizer to singleplayer
• Added bomb defusal to sandbox and room randomizer
• Fixed 2-handed weapon haptics when firing
• Fixed VGMod3 and Hand Stop grip holstering rifles when the primary grip is released
• Fixed Vest speed resetting
• Return of PvP Night Time maps
• Updated various weapon sound fx
• Various under-the-hood improvements and changes
• (Quest) Added Weapon Fire smoke

Known Issues:
• Multiplayer Breaking Whisper boat infiltration. Avatars can and will get stacked on top of each other
• Shotgun shells cannot be placed back into pouches after they have been taken from a pouch
• SPAS currently only has pump-action and cannot be switched to semi-auto
